Content.Text:
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning... What do you want?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello... Mom says I should greet people
properly...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>... I got to see
you again today...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning... I was hoping to see
you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>...I'm glad I got to see
you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>... I'm a little
sleepy...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening... Thank you for
coming to see me...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>... Mornings on
the farm... They feel so good...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>... Please hurry
home after you finish work...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>... What's the matter? Did you
want to see me?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... You have to hurry and...
get your work done... Give it your
best...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, work hard again today... I'm
rooting for you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>... Why did it take you so long
to come talk to me...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... Rough day today? You should
go to bed soon...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>... Thank you for your hard
work...  Please keep up the good work...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... it's warm today... Maybe I should
air out the bedding...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rain... You'll catch a cold if you get
wet... You'd better take care...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The summer sun is nice... Basking in the
sun can be so energizing...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Terrible rain... I hope this house
doesn't have any leaks...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a blue autumn sky... It feels so
good... I'm going to work hard today...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's rain is depressing... I don't
feel like doing anything...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's cold... Winters are hard for me...
Why does it get so cold in winter?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Snow... Does it have to snow so much?
I'm cold...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's so windy... I hope the shop doesn't
get blown away... I'm quite worried...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There's so much snow... I hope the shop
doesn't cave in... I'm quite worried...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You mustn't go out today... I'm worried
about your health, <MYNAME>... Please...
Stay at home...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's snowing so hard today... You must
not go out... Please stay at home...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh... <MYNAME>... I heard you are
dating someone... Mother told me... 
Congratulations...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This forest has many animals... It's a
lot of fun...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom said she likes this forest... I
understand how she feels now...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you catch an animal... show it to
me... I can't wait...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The water from this river... It's
delicious... Perfect for when you're
taking a stroll...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The blue sky that you see from this
mountain is like no other...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh... New designs are welling up in
me... The mountain is giving me ideas
too... I'll ponder this later...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom was so enthusiastic about this
farm... She raves about how great it
is...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why name a farm <MYFARM> Farm?
I'm a little curious...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's dark... But it's quiet and
peaceful...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can use jewels on my clothes... But I
don't think I can use ore...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish there were more people in town...
Then perhaps more people would wear my
designs...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've had more customers lately... That
means there are more people in town,
right? Amazing...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm glad the town has grown and there
are more people... But I can't seem to
remember their names at all...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad this town has been revived...
Now there are so many more people...
<PAGE>
People wear all sorts of clothing...
It's been a real learning experience...
I'm so happy...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Err... The man with a beard... That's
right, Dunhill... He said that this
town was going to be amazing.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ahh...If I could spend the entire day
doing nothing, that's happiness...
Sigh...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It takes time... For clothes that I
can be proud of...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But even if it takes time... the joy
upon completion is amazing... That's
why I don't mind how long it takes...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mother is so kind... But she's scary
when she's upset... Probably the 
scariest in town...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so easy to work in this town... I
can sew clothes at my pace... Coming
here was the right thing to do...
<PAGE>
If you want to buy clothes... come to
my shop anytime... You'll be most
welcome....

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I studied fashion until I came to this
town... I love clothes...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Plus, I can think about fashion 
alone... I don't need to talk to anyone
else...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to this town where my mom
lives... I met you, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
I'm glad I came here... I really am...
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>... thank you for being in
this town...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
No... Please don't talk to me for a
while...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's wrong? Please talk to me some
more...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, when you spoke to other
women... I'd feel so depressed...
Looking back, I was jealous...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom told me to snare you, <MYNAME>...
But you're not an animal...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, since we started going
out... My designs have changed...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>There's a softness to them... That's
what people have told me... I guess
that makes me happy...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think you're amazing, <MYNAME>...
You work on your farm while helping the
town... I really respect that...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... You always give me such
a warm look... It feels so good... Just
like the nature in this town...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Please continue to gaze at me that
way... I love it... I-I'm so
embarrassed...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I want to talk some more... Lately, we
don't communicate as a couple... So
let's talk... Okay?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There's so much work to do on a farm...
Every day is so hard... It's 
dizzying...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I lived with my mom, she would
cook the meals... Now, I have to do
all that...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>When I think back on it... Every day was
hard on her... I must thank her next
time I see her...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cooking is a joy when there's someone to
eat the food... Sewing is the same...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I have people who like my clothes... So
I do my best to sew for them...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You see even the little things in a
different light when you get married...
<PAGE>
Before... I loved doing nothing... Now,
I want to do so many things for you,
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
Is this what being happily married is?
I'm so glad we got married,
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... How do you feel about me?
<PAGE>
W-When I think about you, 
<MYNAME>... my heart starts
pounding...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I still can't believe that you and I are
dating, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>But I'm not sure what one does on
dates... Please teach me...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's the matter, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Even though we broke up... We can still
be friends... Can't we?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is like a dream... We won't fail
this time... Right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I've never even thought about getting
married... Mom celebrates every day and
makes me all sorts of apple dishes...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... D-Don't look this way.
I don't know what to call you now...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your baby is growing inside me,
<MYNAME>... I still can't quite
believe it... Is this for real?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I feel awful every day... Is this how
my mother gave birth to me? Motherhood
isn't easy...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My baby kicks every day... It must be
healthy like you, <MYNAME>... I can't
wait until I give birth...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since <CHILD_NAME> was born, my
stomach has gotten much smaller... I can
finally wear my clothes again...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The knee areas are frayed because <CHILD_NAME>
crawls around so much... I have to mend
them right away. ...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> will make a perfect model
for children's clothes... It will be
so fun to try out different outfits...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> has grown so big... As a parent,
I couldn't be happier...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh... What is that wonderful smell?
<PAGE>
Is that herb soup? It's my favorite...
It looks delicious...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh... This is quite good... T-Thank
you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For me? Why...? No...It's nothing...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I love it... T-Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For me? Thank you... I like this...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey...I don't want it... Well, If have
no choice... I'll take it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? It's really quite an imposition...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Kimchi... It looks so spicy... I don't
want to look at it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so big... For me? Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is huge... For me? Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No thanks... I don't want it until
you understand what's wrong with it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't want it... You already gave me
something...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you... But you already gave me
something...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, <MYNAME>... you already
gave me something...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>...Herb soup? Thank you... I'm so
happy...
<PAGE>
I'll be sure to enjoy this...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>For me? I love this... I'm so happy...
Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>For me? I love this... Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I don't want this...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I don't want this for my birthday...
It's an imposition...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Kimchi for my birthday? Not a chance...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
Such a big birthday present... Thank
you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Correct... Today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
Such a huge birthday present... How did
you grow it? Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
May I use her feathers for an outfit?
<PAGE>
No? Too bad...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want her huge feathers... They're so
unusual... I want to display them...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's licking my hand... So ticklish...
Is it tasty?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why is it so fat? How unusual...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so big... I could ride it... No?
<PAGE>
How boring...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
May I hold her?
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>So heavy... I'm about to fall.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It must feel nice to pet it... May I?
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It feels so good...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so fluffy... It feels nice... I
could pet it forever...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Flowers... How pretty... For me? Thank
you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A present for the Flower Festival?
I-I'm so happy... Thank you,
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll cherish these flowers... Thank
you,  <MYNAME>... I'm so lucky...<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
From you, <MYNAME>? I'll relish every
morsel... Thank you...<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>... Made especially
by you... I can't wait to taste it...
I'm sure it will be delicious...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...What? Today is the Pumpkin
Festival... It's for children... But if
it's all the same, I'll take it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I-It looks delicious... Are you sure I
can have it, <MYNAME>? Mmmm...
Quite satisfying...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's candy for the Pumpkin Festival...
For me, <MYNAME>? How nice...
Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is this? Such a pretty feather...
I know... I'll use it in a new
design...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather? What is it for?
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>What are you saying? I couldn't do
such a thing...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Not here... It's embarrassing... Let's
go over there, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
A blue feather...a proposal... Oh...put
it away... This is embarrassing...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The blue feather you gave me... Because
of this... We were able to get 
married...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I heard from my mother... You showed
a blue feather to someone else,
<MYNAME>... Why would you do that?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
A ring? You want me to come over?
Well... Sure, I guess...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME> gave me this ring. That means 
we can start dating...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How nostalgic... A cherished memory of
myself and <MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I heard from my mother... You showed
a ring to someone else, <MYNAME>...
Why would you do that?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh... Don't peck at my finger... Sorry, 
I don't have any food.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place has so many animals... It's
fun to watch them...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
She's thrashing about... We have to
free the poor thing....

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy birthday... Here you go, a
present... Please use it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is your birthday, <MYNAME>...
I have something I want to give you...
Be at home around <BLUE>7:00 PM</BLUE>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here, <MYNAME>... For you... You
need to build up your stamina so that
you don't collapse...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't look well, <MYNAME>... Has
work been busy?
<PAGE>
Here, you can have this. Thank you for
coming when you're so busy.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh... Mom said to give this to you,
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
It's a token of thanks for always
helping me out... Eat up...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How have you been? I wish we could meet
more often... Like before...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Why won't you speak to me? Did I do
something wrong? If so... I'm sorry...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh... It's hot... I never thought it
would get this hot...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But I'm glad I was able to come to such
a beautiful beach...
<PAGE>
This is another memory we'll share,
<MYNAME>... I'm so happy...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The blue sky... Blue ocean... I could
gaze out at them all day long...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Heh... Don't worry... I won't say I want
to live here...
<PAGE>
The farm where you are, <MYNAME>...
That's where I call home...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The beach... the white foam and sand...
And all sorts of seashells....
<PAGE>
This ocean gives me so many different
design ideas...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place is so tribal... It has a
peculiar atmosphere...
<PAGE>
It might be a little scary... But I
don't dislike it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Say, <MYNAME>, there's supposed to
be an unusual bird here...but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Can you tell me if you see it? But don't
go out of your way to catch it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I just want to see how it lives...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tribal clothes... They express a
culture's legends and traditions...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I'd like to try and create such original
designs and patterns...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, if I'm with you, I think I
can do it... You think so too... Right?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Pink...how pretty... So pretty... This
garden is amazing too...
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>... for bringing me
to such a place...
<PAGE>
I'm in awe... I'm so glad we came...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>... I'd like to cross that
bridge with you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I-If you're busy fishing, never
mind... Really, it's okay...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hand? Y-Yes, I'd like to hold hands...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It would be wonderful to sell Eastern
style clothing in the shop some day...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Beautiful woven pieces in bright
colors... Just having some would
enhance the shop...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>My dreams are getting bigger and
bigger... Heh...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I-I don't need to say it... Right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>It's cold...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>But a world of ice is pretty...Brrr...
When I get home... I'll design some
warmer clothes...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
A weasel... I want to see a weasel.
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Searching for it in this silvery-white
world is going to be fun.
<PAGE>
Oh! No, that's not it. *Giggle*

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your hand...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Heh... Your hand is cold too, <MYNAME>...
We can warm them up... If we hold 
hands...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>So let's just stay like this for
a while...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That outfit is so you, <MYNAME>... I
think it really becomes you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A blue hoodie... I designed that with
you in mind, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
Mmm... It looks good on you, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
That green checkered jacket is one of my
favorites...
<PAGE>
Thank you for wearing it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That outfit suits you, <MYNAME>... It
was worth the effort it took to sew
it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That lime green coat is one of my
favorites...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, I'm so happy to see you wearing
it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, you're wearing that outfit,
<MYNAME>... You look so comfortable in
it...
<PAGE>
Thank you for wearing it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't that outfit fun? I had a great
time designing and sewing it...
<PAGE>
I wasn't sure if someone could pull off
the look, but I'm so glad... You look
great in it, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh... when I was sewing that outfit... I
was thinking of you, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>And it suits you... I'm so glad to
see you wearing it... Thank you...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That blue down vest looks good on you, 
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I think I was subconsciously thinking of
what suits you, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Lately, I think about you all the
time... I really have to be more
careful...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that outfit looks good on you, 
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
Actually, I was thinking of you while I
was sewing it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh... I was so pleased with myself when
I sewed that outfit... I'm happy to see
you wearing it...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
That big cat is so cute... Can I...give
it a hug?
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Huh? Of course, I know it's you inside,
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I love cats and I love you, <MYNAME>...
I was going to give you both a hug...
Won't you let me?
